title: Extraordinary self-powered Y-shape flexible film thermoelectric device for wearables
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01742K, Communication
Xinjie Yuan, Pengfei Qiu, Chuanyao Sun, Shiqi Yang, Yi Wu, Lidong Chen, Xun Shi
Wearables ungently demand the efficient flexible film thermoelectric (TE) technology to self-power the integral electronics. However, limited by the strong correlation between the thickness and temperature gradient across TE legs,...
